Class JsonFileManager

java.lang.Object
Controller.Utilities.JsonFileManager
public class JsonFileManager extends Object
Class used to read and write on files.

For JSON management provides:

  • wirteJson
  • readJson
Author:
D'annibale Luigi, Venturini Daniele
